created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: The time the configuration was created.

last_used_at.title: Last Used At
last_used_at.description: The time the configuration was last used at.

username.title: Username
username.description: The username of the user this configuration belongs to.

issuer.title: Issuer
issuer.description: The issuer name this was generated with.

digits.title: Digits
digits.description: The number of digits this configuration uses.

period.title: Period
period.description: The period of time this configuration uses.

secret.title: Secret
secret.description: The secret shared key for this configuration.
